@vinit_tarey: good to hear that.

In case you virtual keypads to some of this games, you can do these step:

1. Open the jar file using winrar or 7zip.
2. Look for META-INF folder.
3. Open Manifest.mf
4. Put this line: 
          MIDlet-Touch-Support: True
5. Save and enjoy.
All of these work great on my Samsung Montes S5620, Cheer INKHRIPTOR, I will seed.
